divs: Sighting DetailsI was driving into a McDonalds parking lot tonight and yelled at my mom to stop. We looked at the light and i kinda freak out in excitement because I saw it again but as we turned to each other thinking wtf and look back after a second it vanished and when i say a second it was litterly like a slow blink that quick. I have seen these hovering lights about 4 or 5 times this year this is the second time it has quickly disappeared into thin air after spotting it and looking away for a quick second. the other times i have spotted one of these it would slowly hover upwards into the sky and a very bright light and slowly became a very dull small light and disappears and then i saw flashing lights like airplanes but were flying a lot faster than an actual airplane. this is weird and i thought i was crazy and seeing this but its happened so many times this year.
trends: There has been one other sighting in Newcastle
There were no other sightings in Newcastle on or around September 9th 2012
Summary: big yellowy white bright light in the sky hovering and then looked away for about 2 seconds and it was no where to be seen.
